hero-description: Specialized technology consulting in sustainable energy, advanced electronics, and professional technical services. We transform ideas into real solutions.
tech-description: Sustainable energy solutions, advanced robotics, and cutting-edge electronics.
services-description: Professional inspection, homologation, and specialized technical auditing.
business-description: Global expansion, strategic outsourcing, and international technological collaboration.
contact-description: Let's talk about how we can help transform your project into reality.
mission-page-subtitle: The principles that guide our work and relationships with clients and partners
mission-text: Transform innovative ideas into real technological solutions, connecting European companies with global markets through specialized consulting in sustainable energy, advanced electronics, and top-quality technical services.
vision-text: To be the leading technological bridge between Europe and Asia, driving the transformation towards a sustainable future through technological innovation and international collaboration.
value-innovation-desc: We constantly seek new solutions and technologies that generate real value for our clients.
value-quality-desc: Committed to technical excellence and compliance with the highest international standards.
value-sustainability-desc: We prioritize projects that contribute to a cleaner, more sustainable future for generations to come.
value-collaboration-desc: We believe in the power of strategic alliances and bidirectional knowledge transfer.
value-trust-desc: We build long-term relationships based on transparency, honesty, and commitment fulfillment.
value-global-desc: We understand local markets with an international perspective, connecting cultures and opportunities.
contact-page-subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's talk about how we can help you
contact-response-text: We respond within 24 hours on business days
form-success: Message sent successfully! We'll respond soon.
form-error: There was an error sending the message. Please try again or write directly to contacto@rebollootion.com
tech-page-subtitle: Sustainable energy and advanced electronics for a cleaner future
hydrogen-intro: Development of green hydrogen solutions as the energy vector of the future. H2 production, storage, and distribution projects for industrial decarbonization.
hydrogen-plant-desc: Green hydrogen production plant design using alkaline electrolysis. Capacity: 5 MW.
hydrogen-storage-desc: Hydrogen storage and compression system for industrial applications and mobility.
wind-intro: Consulting and development of onshore and offshore wind farms. Feasibility analysis, installation design, and energy production optimization.
wind-park-desc: Complete onshore wind farm development with 15 latest-generation turbines.
wind-maintenance-desc: IoT monitoring and predictive maintenance system for wind farm optimization.
solar-intro: High-efficiency photovoltaic solar installations for distributed generation and utility-scale plants. Integration with storage systems.
solar-plant-desc: Design and implementation of photovoltaic plant with solar tracking and storage system.
solar-selfconsumption-desc: Photovoltaic self-consumption solutions for reducing industrial energy costs.
biomass-intro: Energy utilization of organic waste and forest biomass. Cogeneration plants and sustainable biofuel production.
biomass-plant-desc: Power generation plant from regional forestry and agricultural waste.
robotics-intro: Robotic systems for industrial automation, inspection, and maintenance. AI and computer vision integration.
robot-inspection-desc: Autonomous robot for critical infrastructure inspection with artificial vision and NDT sensors.
robot-arm-desc: Production line automation system with precise control and collaborative safety.
cybersecurity-intro: Protection of critical infrastructure and industrial systems. Security audits and incident response plans.
cyber-audit-desc: Security assessment of SCADA systems and OT industrial networks.
automation-intro: Control and automation systems for Industry 4.0. IoT integration, digital twins, and real-time monitoring.
automation-twin-desc: Digital twin implementation for real-time production process optimization.
automation-scada-desc: Supervision and control system development for water treatment plant.
mobility-intro: Autonomous vehicles, fleet management systems, and smart electric mobility solutions.
mobility-autonomous-desc: Autonomous vehicle prototype for industrial environments with LiDAR systems and AI.
services-page-subtitle: Top-quality inspection, homologation, and technical auditing
inspection-intro: Professional technical inspection services with NDT photography and comprehensive documentation. Experience in Oil & Gas, civil construction, and hydrology.
inspection-oilgas-desc: Petrochemical facility inspection with advanced NDT techniques and infrared thermography.
inspection-civil-desc: Inspection of structures, foundations, and civil works. Technical report with detailed photography.
inspection-hydro-desc: Inspection of hydraulic infrastructure, dams, and water treatment systems.
homologation-intro: Comprehensive homologation and certification process management. Advisory on national and international regulatory compliance.
homologation-ce-desc: Complete processing for CE marking of industrial machinery and electronic products.
homologation-iso-desc: Consulting for implementation and certification of quality and environmental management systems.
audit-intro: Specialized technical audits in industrial and technological projects. Risk analysis and process optimization.
audit-energy-desc: Industrial energy efficiency analysis with improvement plan and estimated ROI.
audit-due-desc: Comprehensive technical evaluation for M&A operations in industrial and technology sectors.
business-page-subtitle: We expand your business to global markets with proven strategies
localization-intro: We facilitate European companies' entry into Asian markets. Local knowledge, contact network, and experience in commercial regulations.
localization-china-desc: Opening operations in Shanghai and Shenzhen for European tech company. Legal establishment and commercial structure.
localization-india-desc: Facilitation of strategic alliance with local partner in Chennai for electronic component manufacturing.
outsourcing-intro: Technology outsourcing services with verified partners. Cost optimization while maintaining European quality standards.
outsourcing-software-desc: Offshore team management in India for enterprise application development with agile methodology.
outsourcing-electronics-desc: PCB production coordination in Shenzhen with European quality control and integrated logistics.
collaboration-intro: Establishment of technological alliances for innovative product co-development. Bidirectional knowledge transfer.
collaboration-rd-desc: Collaborative research project on solid-state batteries with Chinese university and European company.
aspirations-intro: Projects under development and future collaboration opportunities in emerging markets.
aspirations-hub-desc: Establishment of innovation center in Singapore as a bridge between Europe and Asia-Pacific.
aspirations-markets-desc: Exploration of opportunities in Vietnam, Thailand, and Indonesia for engineering services.
